meanings.definition: A unit of radioactivity equal to one million curies.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the radiation in multicurie units.
meanings.sent2: The lab reported that the sample had a high level of multicurie radioactivity.
meanings.sent3: The multicurie measurement was so high that even the Geiger counter was surprised!
meanings.sent4: The multicurie level in the room was like a glowing beacon of danger.
meanings.sent5: The multicurie unit was as bright as a thousand suns in the dark lab.

meanings.definition: A measurement of radioactivity equivalent to one million curies.
meanings.sent1: The hospital needed to handle the disposal of multicurie waste carefully.
meanings.sent2: The multicurie reading on the Geiger counter was off the charts.
meanings.sent3: The multicurie amount was so high that it made the lab technician's eyes widen.
meanings.sent4: The multicurie measurement felt like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: The multicurie level was as intense as a storm brewing in the sky.
